items.content_html: Daily Download Folder is a lightweight Chrome extension that automatically organizes your downloads into daily folders based on the current date. Each time you download a file, the extension dynamically creates a new folder (e.g., 2024-09-13) inside your default download directory and saves the file in it.
items.title: eriock/Daily-Download-Folder: Daily Download Folder is a lightweight Chrome extension that automatically organizes your downloads into daily folders based on the current date. Each time you download a file, the extension dynamically creates a new folder (e.g., 2024-09-13) inside your default download directory and saves the file in it.
